questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face a challenge against a Warlord of the Sea known for his ability to turn people into toys. What is...?
This arc sees the Straw Hat Pirates entering a secretive country ruled by a powerful Shogun and an Emperor. What is...?
This arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates' involvement in a rebellion against a tyrant king on an island in the sky. What is...?
This technique, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows the user to create and manipulate poison. What is...?
This ability, used by a notorious pirate, grants the power to produce and control mochi. What is...?
This power, wielded by one of the Supernovas, allows the user to create and manipulate rooms where they can spatially manipulate anything inside. What is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for his shadow-shadow fruit powers and large, looming presence. Who is...?
This character is the leader of the Whitebeard Pirates and was known as the 'Strongest Man in the World'. Who is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for their former bounty of 340 million berries and their power of the Mera Mera no Mi. Who is...?
